short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_AU,en_GB,e: Deze add-on vindt de telefoonnummers op de actieve webpagina en belt het na een muisklik bij gebruik van onze aangepaste PBX-client
short.en: The unified communications manager is a toolset to assist you to use your PBX easily with your daily phone use.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Your unified communications PBX in the cloud is designed to meet the  most demanding business operations in phone communications. The UC  manager is there for you to quickly deal with the most common phone  operations and not let the cloud PBX complexity get in your way. You  can click on phone numbers from a browsers and office applications and  the number is dialed for you. You can manage when you can be reached  or where you can be reached by with just a few mouse clicks.  Monitoring your customers waiting in the ACD is available to you right  on the the desktop. Quickly set your self to do not disturb or set up  a call forward, it is all there and easy to use.
